description: Creates a refactor across multiple stacks, with the list of stacks and resources that are affected.

parameters.name: ResourceMappings
parameters.description: The mappings for the stack resource Source and stack resource Destination. (dict) --- Specifies the current source of the resource and the destination of where it will be moved to. The source stack StackName and LogicalResourceId for the resource being refactored. The name associated with the stack. The logical name of the resource specified in the template. The destination stack StackName and LogicalResourceId for the resource being refactored. The logical name of the resource specified in the template.

nested_params.name: Source
nested_params.description: The source stack StackName and LogicalResourceId for the resource being refactored.

nested_params.name: StackName
nested_params.description: The name associated with the stack.

nested_params.name: LogicalResourceId
nested_params.description: The logical name of the resource specified in the template.

nested_params.name: Destination
nested_params.description: The destination stack StackName and LogicalResourceId for the resource being refactored.

nested_params.name: StackName
nested_params.description: The name associated with the stack.

nested_params.name: LogicalResourceId
nested_params.description: The logical name of the resource specified in the template.

parameters.name: StackDefinitions
parameters.description: The stacks being refactored. (dict) --- Describes the stack and the template used by the stack. StackName (string) --- The name associated with the stack. TemplateBody (string) --- The file path for the stack template file. TemplateURL (string) --- The desired final state of the stack template.

nested_params.name: StackName
nested_params.description: The name associated with the stack.

nested_params.name: TemplateBody
nested_params.description: The file path for the stack template file.

nested_params.name: TemplateURL
nested_params.description: The desired final state of the stack template.

nested_items.name: StackRefactorId
nested_items.description: The ID associated with the stack refactor created from the  CreateStackRefactor action.
